gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

Class MatrixRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.FrameRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.BasicFrameRenderer
        • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.MatrixRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer, Transformer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpectraRenderer

    public class MatrixRenderer
extends BasicFrameRenderer
    A class that renders data in a 2D matrix. The first column is the x axis, the second column is the rank, all subsequent columns are data columns. Can not be instantiated with a null matrix.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli

    • Field Detail

      • lineRenderers

        protected ShapeRenderer[] lineRenderers
        The line renderers. The length of this array should equal the number of columns in the data. A value of null for a column means that no line renderer should be displayed for that column

      • pointRenderers

        protected DataPointRenderer[] pointRenderers
        The point renderers. The length of this array should equal the number of columns in the data. A value of null for a column means that no point renderer should be displayed for that column

      • createDefaultLineRenderers

        public void createDefaultLineRenderers(int start,
                              Color color)
        Creates default line renderers. These are solid lines that cycle through the standard ColorCycler.
        Parameters:
        start - initial position in sequence
        color - color of lines

                               char shape,
                               Color color)

        Parameters:

        shape - shape to draw for data points
        color - color of lines
